# Built-in Templates
# Generated by Echo ðŸŒ™

This directory contains pre-built templates for common DevOps tasks.

## Available Templates

- CI/CD workflows (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins)
- Dockerfiles for various languages
- Terraform modules for cloud providers
- Kubernetes manifests
- Helm charts
- Prometheus alerting rules
- Grafana dashboards

Templates are provided by the respective generators in the devops_suite package.
